title: The Biden-Trump Presidential Debate
content:
Each will make his case to the American people with just over four months until Election Day.

--- SNIPPET ---

ach candidate will have two minutes to answer a question, and one minute each for responses and rebuttals. An additional minute for follow-up, clarification or response is at the moderatorsï¿½ discretion.

--- SNIPPET ---

For example, a basket of groceries that cost $100 then, now costs more than $12; and typical home prices have jumped more than 30 percent.

--- SNIPPET ---

The pandemic are so badly handled, many people were dying.

--- SNIPPET ---

There were no jobs. Unemployment rate rose to 15 percent.

--- SNIPPET ---

We created 15,000 new jobs. We brought on ï¿½ in a position where we have 800,000 new manufacturing jobs.

--- SNIPPET ---

Working class people are still in trouble.
I come from Scranton, Pennsylvania. I come from a household where the kitchen table ï¿½ if things werenï¿½t able to be met during the month was a problem.

--- SNIPPET ---

Weï¿½re going to make sure we build 2 million new units.

--- SNIPPET ---

We created, as I said, those (ph) jobs. We made sure we had a situation where we now ï¿½ we brought down the price of prescription drugs, which is a major issue for many people, to $15 for ï¿½ for an insulin shot, as opposed to $400. No senior has to pay more than $200 for any drug ï¿½ all the drugs they (inaudible) beginning next year.

--- SNIPPET ---

The only jobs he created are for illegal immigrants and bounceback jobs; theyï¿½re bounced back from the COVID.

--- SNIPPET ---

He had the largest tax cut in American history, $2 trillion.

--- SNIPPET ---

Heï¿½s the only president other than Herbert Hoover who has lost more jobs than he had when he began, since Herbert Hoover.

--- SNIPPET ---

nd the military ï¿½ you know, when he was president, they were still killing people in Afghanistan.

--- SNIPPET ---

You can do whatever you want with the minute that we give you.
I want to follow up. You want to impose a 10 percent tariff on all goods coming into the U.

--- SNIPPET ---

Thatï¿½s why we had all the jobs. And the jobs went down and then they bounced back and heï¿½s taking credit for bounceback jobs. You canï¿½t do that.
He also said he inherited 9 percent inflation.

--- SNIPPET ---

And then it blew up under his leadership, because they spent money like a bunch of people that didnï¿½t know what they were doing.

--- SNIPPET ---

He got out, it was the most embarrassing day in the history of our countryï¿½s life.

--- SNIPPET ---

And according to a new non-partisan analysis, President Trump, your administration approved $8.4 trillion in new debt. While so far, President Biden, youï¿½ve approved $4.3 trillion in new debt.
So former President Trump, many of the tax cuts that you signed into law are set to expire next year.

--- SNIPPET ---

ow, when we cut the taxes ï¿½ as an example, the corporate tax was cut down to 21 percent from 39 percent, plus beyond that ï¿½ we took in more revenue with much less tax and companies were bringing back trillions of dollars back into our country.

--- SNIPPET ---

emember, more people died under his administration, even though we had largely fixed it. More people died under his administration than our administration, and we were right in the middle of it. Something which a lot of people donï¿½t like to talk about, but he had far more people dying in his administration.

--- SNIPPET ---

He did a mandate on the vaccine, which is the thing that people most objected to about the vaccine.

--- SNIPPET ---

nd Iï¿½d love to ask him, and will, why he allowed millions of people to come in here from prisons, jails and mental institutions to come into our country and destroy our country.

--- SNIPPET ---

IDEN: He had the largest national debt of any president four-year period, number one.
Number two, he got $2 trillion tax cut, benefited the very wealthy.

--- SNIPPET ---

Theyï¿½re in a situation where they, in fact, pay 8.2 percent in taxes. If they just paid 24 percent or 25 percent, either one of those numbers, theyï¿½d raised $500 million ï¿½ billion dollars, I should say, in a 10-year period.

--- SNIPPET ---

And heï¿½s destroying Medicare, because all of these people are coming in, theyï¿½re putting them on Medicare, theyï¿½re putting them on Social Security.

--- SNIPPET ---

These millions and millions of people coming in, theyï¿½re trying to put them on Social Security.

--- SNIPPET ---

Foreign countries ï¿½ Iï¿½m friends with a lot of people.

--- SNIPPET ---

They think weï¿½re very stupid people.

--- SNIPPET ---

Thatï¿½s the vote of the people.

--- SNIPPET ---

Some people ï¿½ you have to follow your heart. Some people donï¿½t believe in that.

--- SNIPPET ---

Some people donï¿½t.

--- SNIPPET ---

he problem they have is theyï¿½re radical, because they will take the life of a child in the eighth month, the ninth month, and even after birth ï¿½ after birth.

--- SNIPPET ---

RUMP: There have been many young women murdered by the same people he allows to come across our border.

--- SNIPPET ---

ut theyï¿½re voting and itï¿½s bringing it back to the vote of the people, which is what everybody wanted, including the founders, if they knew about this issue, which frankly they didnï¿½t, but they would have ï¿½ everybody want it brought back.

--- SNIPPET ---

nd again, this gives it the vote of the people.

--- SNIPPET ---

Second time is between a doctor and an extreme situation.

--- SNIPPET ---

RUMP: So that means he can take the life of the baby in the ninth month and even after birth, because some states, Democrat-run, take it after birth.

--- SNIPPET ---

o heï¿½s in ï¿½ heï¿½s willing to, as we say, rip the baby out of the womb in the ninth month and kill the baby.

--- SNIPPET ---

Iï¿½ve changed it in a way that now youï¿½re in a situation where there are 40 percent fewer people coming across the border illegally.

--- SNIPPET ---

e decided to open up our border, open up our country to people that are from prisons, people that are from mental institutions, insane asylum, terrorists.

--- SNIPPET ---

And people are dying all over the place, including the people that are coming up in caravans.

--- SNIPPET ---

But the idea theyï¿½re emptying their prisons, weï¿½re welcoming these people, thatï¿½s simply not true.

--- SNIPPET ---

Does that mean that you will deport every undocumented immigrant in America, including those who have jobs, including those whose spouses are citizens, and including those who have lived here for decades? And if so, how will you do it?
TRUMP: Can I get one second?
He said we killed three people. The people we killed are al-Baghdadi and Salamani (sic), the two greatest terrorists, biggest terrorists anywhere in the world.

--- SNIPPET ---

eï¿½s the one that killed people with the bad border, including hundreds of thousands of people dying, and also killing our citizens when they come in.

--- SNIPPET ---

Theyï¿½re killing our people in New York, in California, in every state in the union, because we donï¿½t have borders anymore. Every state is now a border.
And because of his ridiculous, insane and very stupid policies, people are coming in and theyï¿½re killing our citizens at a level that weï¿½ve never seen.

--- SNIPPET ---

And we have to get a lot of these people out and we have to get them out fast, because theyï¿½re going to destroy our country.

--- SNIPPET ---

But he has killed so many people at our border by allowingï¿½
TAPPER: Thank you, President Trump.
TRUMP: ï¿½ all of these people to come in.
TAPPER: President Bidenï¿½
TRUMP: And itï¿½s a very sad day in America.

--- SNIPPET ---

My ï¿½ my son spent a year in Iraq living next to one of those burn pits. Came back with stage four glioblastoma.
I was recently in ï¿½ in ï¿½ in France for D-Day, and I spoke to all ï¿½ about those heroes that died.

--- SNIPPET ---

He was standing with his four-star general, and he told him ï¿½ he said, I donï¿½t want to go in there because theyï¿½re a bunch of losers and suckers.

--- SNIPPET ---

We had 19 people that said I didnï¿½t say it.

--- SNIPPET ---

o think that I would, in front of generals and others, say suckers and losers ï¿½ we have 19 people that said it was never said by me.

--- SNIPPET ---

I want to begin with Russiaï¿½s war against Ukraine, which is now in its third year.

--- SNIPPET ---

lot of people are dead right now, much more than people know.

--- SNIPPET ---

And by the way, we left people behind too.

--- SNIPPET ---

ASH: ï¿½ Iï¿½m going to come back to you for one minute.

Heï¿½s given $200 billion now or more to Ukraine. Heï¿½s given $200 billion.

--- SNIPPET ---

Every time that Zelenskyy comes to this country, he walks away with $60 billion.

People being killed so needlessly, so stupidly, and I will get it settled and Iï¿½ll get it settled fast, before I take office.
